page.title: 07A DAY AT THE PLAYGROUP
page.content: THE HELPERS ARRIVE AT 9.A.M AND SET UP THE EQUIPMENT FOR THE CHILDREN'S ARRIVAL AT 9.30 A.M.THE CHILDREN PLAY WITH EQUIPMENT UNTIL 10.50 A.M.THEY PACK THEIR TOYS AWAY AND HAVE BISCUITS AND MILK,AFTER A PRAYER IS SAID.IF IT IS A BIRTHDAY,A CAKE IS MADE AND THE CHILDREN TAKE HOME A PIECE.THEN THEY LISTEN TO A STORY,BEFORE FINISHING WITH SINGING OR DANCING.BEFORE THEY LEAVE THEIR PAINTINGS ARE GIVEN OUT. EQUIPMENT:-PLAY-DOUGH,SIT AND RIDE CARS,SAND TRAY,PLAY TUNNEL,LEGO AND DUPLO BRICKS,BIG BUILDER SET,LARGE CLIMBING FRAME WITH SLIDE,HAMMER AND NAIL SET,BALANCING BUCKET SCALES,WATER PLAY BATH WITH TOYS,GARAGE WITH CARS,LARGE CANVAS WENDY HOUSE,MAGNET,LETS PRETEND UNIT,HOME CORNER.
